name: Senior Software Engineer (.NET+ANGULAR)
description:
A Luxemburg based educational non-profit organization is seeking an experienced, dedicated, and well-organized Senior Software Engineer.

The organization focuses on empowering kids in the development of essential life skills such as logical thinking, problem-solving, teamwork, self-learning and creativity.

The aim of the organization is to teach young kids STEM and coding concepts along with other essential life skills. The aim of the company is to help prepare kids for a digital heavy future. As a developer, you will be predominantly responsible for designing, developing, deploying and maintaining web applications following established architecture standards and best project management methodologies. This role is more than a challenging development role.

The organization has partnered with highly successful companies such as HSBC, Luxemburg National Research Fund, Nexten.io, the LHoFT and many others.

Requirements:

  • 6+ years of overall development experience using different Microsoft Technologies;
  • 3+ years of commercial experience with Angular;
  • 3+ years of experience with NET CORE, Entity Framework, WEB API, MVC, C#;
  • Experience with DevOps tools such as Docker, Github;
  • Experience working with AWS;
  • Proven experience in integrating 3rd Party API as and when required;
  • Good experience with MySQL / MariaDB and SQL Server;
  • Strong knowledge of OOD, OOP, design patterns, software architecture, systems integration concepts and frameworks;
  • Proven experience in developing and deploying applications from scratch;

  • Knowledge of accessing data by using Microsoft ADO.NET.

Nice-to-have:

  • Experience handling projects without any support;
  • Experience leading a team.

Conditions:

  • Remote work, flexible working hours;
  • 13th salary;
  • Performance-based quarterly bonuses.
